notes: [Added] It’s now possible to configure what type of announcements are shown in an Announcements widget.
[Improved] The Edit Announcement page now only shows the date fields if maintenance is enabled.
[Improved] New announcements now don’t have a maintenance mode enabled by default. Makes it more straightforward to set up messages that don’t trigger maintenance mode.
[Added] `127.0.0.1` is now added to the default configuration of whitelisted IP Addresses.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where frontend maintenance didn’t work when backend maintenance was disabled.
[Added] It is now possible to make settings from the plugin’s settings page and from the `craft/config/maintenance.php` config file.
[Improved] Adjusted some terms for the English language.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where admins were seeing the maintenance overlay and normal users were not.
